channel.title: Command help

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“death”) && playerLevel[19] >= 90) {
if(!guardian) {
server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2862, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
summonedNPCS++;
actionTimer = 99999999;
death = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“your message here”);
}
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("guardian") && playerLevel[19] >= 99) {
	if(!death) {
    		server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(3101, absX, absY-2, heightLevel, absX-2, absY-2, absX+2, absY-2, 2, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
    		summonedNPCS++;
    		actionTimer = 99999999;
		guardian = true;
	} else {
		sendMessage("your message here");
	}
    }[/code]

You also need to declare:

boolean death, guardian;

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @issac issac
item.description:
@issac wrote:

i want to know how to make it so if you have one code active. then u cant do this other one.

so if you do ::death you cant do ::guardian

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“death”) && playerLevel[19] >= 90) {
server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2862, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
summonedNPCS++;
actionTimer = 99999999;
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“guardian”) && playerLevel[19] >= 99) {
server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(3101, absX, absY-2, heightLevel, absX-2, absY-2, absX+2, absY-2, 2, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
summonedNPCS++;
actionTimer = 99999999;
}
